pullRequest.title: [15025] Use GA APIs for XML Binding/WebSvcs/etc. and rename features
pullRequest.bodyText:
Renaming from old trademarked feature names to EE9-approved names.
Pulling in GA APIs for XML Binding, XML Web Services, Web Services
Metadata and XML SOAP.

Fixes #15025

beforeCommit.message:
[15025] Use GA APIs for XML Binding/WebSvcs/etc. and rename features

- Renaming from old trademarked feature names to EE9-approved names.
- Pulling in GA APIs for XML Binding, XML Web Services, Web Services
Metadata and XML SOAP.

nodes.bodyText: I assume this is just git being funny and mismatching the project names after the rename, but just want to point it out just in case.
Should we change the feature name as well from jaxb to xmlBinding?

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,16 +12,16 @@ IBM-API-Package: \
   jakarta.xml.bind.attachment;  type="spec", \
   jakarta.xml.bind.helpers;  type="spec", \
   jakarta.xml.bind.util;  type="spec"
-IBM-ShortName: jaxb-3.0
+IBM-ShortName: xmlBinding-3.0

nodes.bodyText:
Please add:
WLP-AlsoKnownAs: jaxws-3.0
Also add dependency on feature
com.ibm.websphere.appserver.eeCompatible-9.0
And consider adding:
WLP-Activation-Type: parallel
Also the NLS files may need to be updated to remove reference to JAX-WS
Since xmlWS-3.0 isn't a thing yet that can be really enabled, does this cause test failures?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -27,7 +27,8 @@ tested.features: \
         messagingClient-3.0,\
         messagingServer-3.0,\
         messaging-3.0,\
-        jakartaeeClient-9.0
+        jakartaeeClient-9.0,\
+        xmlWS-3.0

nodes.bodyText: Yeah it is.  You can see it in the other one as well.  It did its best.
Should this bundle name and symbolic name change to remove reference to jaxb?
Should the package name change to be xmlbinding instead of jaxb?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -16,8 +16,8 @@ Bundle-Name: IBM JAXB SchemaGen Tool
 
 Require-Compiler: true
 
-Require-Bundle: io.openliberty.jaxb.3.0.internal.tools; version="[1,1.0.100)", \
- io.openliberty.jakarta.jaxb.3.0; version="[1,1.0.100)"; location="dev/api/spec/", \
+Require-Bundle: io.openliberty.xmlBinding.3.0.internal.tools; version="[1,1.0.100)", \
+ io.openliberty.jakarta.xmlBinding.3.0; version="[1,1.0.100)"; location="dev/api/spec/", \
  com.ibm.ws.logging; version="[1,1.0.100)"
  
 Command-Class: io.openliberty.jaxb.tools.SchemaGen

nodes.bodyText: Should this bundle name and symbolic name change to remove reference to jaxb?
Should the package name change to be xmlbinding instead of jaxb?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -16,8 +16,8 @@ Bundle-Name: IBM JAXB XJC Tool
 
 Require-Compiler: true
 
-Require-Bundle: io.openliberty.jaxb.3.0.internal.tools; version="[1,1.0.100)", \
- io.openliberty.jakarta.jaxb.3.0; version="[1,1.0.100)"; location="dev/api/spec/", \ \
+Require-Bundle: io.openliberty.xmlBinding.3.0.internal.tools; version="[1,1.0.100)", \
+ io.openliberty.jakarta.xmlBinding.3.0; version="[1,1.0.100)"; location="dev/api/spec/", \ \
  com.ibm.ws.logging; version="[1,1.0.100)"
  
 Command-Class: io.openliberty.jaxb.tools.XJC

nodes.bodyText: Should the nls files paths be updated to remove reference to jaxb in the package?  Also the nls files should be updated to remove reference to JAXB.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -16,8 +16,8 @@ Bundle-Name: IBM JAXB XJC Tool
 
 Require-Compiler: true
 
-Require-Bundle: io.openliberty.jaxb.3.0.internal.tools; version="[1,1.0.100)", \
- io.openliberty.jakarta.jaxb.3.0; version="[1,1.0.100)"; location="dev/api/spec/", \ \
+Require-Bundle: io.openliberty.xmlBinding.3.0.internal.tools; version="[1,1.0.100)", \
+ io.openliberty.jakarta.xmlBinding.3.0; version="[1,1.0.100)"; location="dev/api/spec/", \ \
  com.ibm.ws.logging; version="[1,1.0.100)"
  
 Command-Class: io.openliberty.jaxb.tools.XJC

beforeCommit.message:
[15025] Use GA APIs for XML Binding/WebSvcs/etc. and rename features

- Renaming from old trademarked feature names to EE9-approved names.
- Pulling in GA APIs for XML Binding, XML Web Services, Web Services
Metadata and XML SOAP.

afterCommit.message:
[15025] Use GA APIs for XML Binding/WebSvcs/etc. and rename features

- Renaming from old trademarked feature names to EE9-approved names.
- Pulling in GA APIs for XML Binding, XML Web Services, Web Services
Metadata and XML SOAP.

nodes.bodyText: The , \ is missing.  Not sure what happened, but it was removed.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -40,7 +40,7 @@ Subsystem-Name: Jakarta Server Faces 3.0
  io.openliberty.jakarta.validation-3.0, \
  io.openliberty.jakarta.faces-3.0, \
  io.openliberty.pages-3.0, \
- io.openliberty.jakarta.jaxb-3.0; \
+ io.openliberty.jakarta.xmlBinding-3.0; \

nodes.bodyText: Did you decide not to update the nls files for this feature?  They reference JAX-WS in them.
You changed this here, but the file is still io.openliberty.jaxb in reality.  Also JaxbToolsMessages should be changed as well it would seem.
Should the TR_GROUP also be updated?

I think now with the other changes you made you can do:
-files=\
  bin/xmlBinding/xjc.bat, \
  bin/xmlBinding/tools/ws-schemagen.jar, \
  bin/xmlBinding/schemagen; ibm.executable:=true; ibm.file.encoding:=ebcdic, \
  bin/xmlBinding/xjc; ibm.executable:=true; ibm.file.encoding:=ebcdic, \
  bin/xmlBinding/tools/ws-xjc.jar, \
  bin/xmlBinding/schemagen.bat
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,16 +12,17 @@ IBM-API-Package: \
   jakarta.xml.bind.attachment;  type="spec", \
   jakarta.xml.bind.helpers;  type="spec", \
   jakarta.xml.bind.util;  type="spec"
-IBM-ShortName: jaxb-3.0
+IBM-ShortName: xmlBinding-3.0
 IBM-Process-Types: client, \
  server
 Subsystem-Name: Jakarta XML Bindings 3.0
 -features=\
   com.ibm.websphere.appserver.classloading-1.0, \
   com.ibm.websphere.appserver.eeCompatible-9.0, \
-  io.openliberty.jakarta.jaxb-3.0
+  io.openliberty.jakarta.xmlBinding-3.0
 -bundles=\
-  io.openliberty.jaxb.3.0.internal.tools
+  io.openliberty.xmlBinding.3.0.internal.tools

commit.message:
[15025] Use GA APIs for XML Binding/WebSvcs/etc. and rename features

- Renaming from old trademarked feature names to EE9-approved names.
- Pulling in GA APIs for XML Binding, XML Web Services, Web Services
Metadata and XML SOAP.
